title: Stone Farmhouse on Farm Estate
description:
Charming farmhouse on 10 acre horse farm in the heart of Bucks County, located 7 miles from Doylestown , the County  Seat.  Furnished with antiques, a Roger Wright gourmet kitchen, covered front porch, with large deck off the back of the house with views of the pastures. This farmhouse has been completely renovated, a beautiful place ti live!
The main floor has  a Roger Wright gourmet kitchen, dinning room, and living room with a fireplace.  There is a half bath off of the kitchen.
There are two bedrooms on the second floor.The master bedroom has a sitting area and a fireplace and a full bath w/shower. The second bedroom has a full bath in the hallway. There are two bedrooms on the  third floor with a king bed.
There is a laundry room in the basement area with washer and dryer.
This house is being rented short term. Three months to six months.  All utilities are included(electric up to $150.00 a mont), except fuel oil for heating.....

description:
Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. title: Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living!
description:

You enter the home through a foyer with a hanging closet that leads you to the generous living/dining room. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and an abundance of cabinet and counter space. title: Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. Charming 1-Bedroom Residence with a Spacious Rear Deck in Philadelphia's Graduate Hospital Neighborhood. Welcome to your new home nestled in the vibrant and sought-after Graduate Hospital neighborhood of Philadelphia. This delightful 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence offers a comfortable and stylish living space, complete with modern amenities and convenient features. With its prime location, hardwood floors, central air conditioning, in-unit washer/dryer, and ample storage space in the basement, this rental property presents an excellent opportunity for a comfortable and enjoyable urban lifestyle. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by the warm ambiance of the hardwood floors that run throughout the entire residence, lending an elegant touch to the space. The bedroom is thoughtfully designed with ample closet space, allowing you to keep your belongings neatly organized and easily accessible. One of the highlights of this remarkable property is the rear deck, providing the perfect outdoor oasis for relaxation and entertainment. Whether you're sipping your morning coffee, enjoying an al fresco meal, or soaking up the sun, this private deck is an ideal space to unwind and appreciate the beautiful weather. It offers ample room for outdoor furniture and potted plants, allowing you to personalize the space according to your preferences. Additional features of this residence include central air conditioning to keep you comfortable during hot summer days, laundry facilities conveniently located in the basement, and extra storage space for your seasonal items and belongings. Located in the highly desirable Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this residence offers the best of urban living. description:
Looking for a luxury apartment in the heart of Philadelphia? A blend of vintage charm and modern comfort, The Franklin Residences offers one and two bedroom apartments in Philadelphia, PA, with an unparalleled lifestyle. Live in a historic building with contemporary amenities, centrally located in Washington Square West, offering the best of Philly footsteps from your front door. The Franklin Residences is an iconic high-rise in Philadelphia with a rich history that has been transformed into a luxury apartment community with unparalleled conveniences. Have the best of both worlds – historic charm and modern living in Center City, Philadelphia, apartments today! Formerly known as the Benjamin Franklin Hotel, the Franklin Residences transports you to a different time once you step inside. Our community is also pet-friendly, and your furry companions will feel right at home with nearby green space and pet-themed resident events like Yappy Hours. title: GREAT DEAL: 1-Bdrm Apt in Vibrant 335 Bala Building - Avail July 1!
description:
Hello!
My partner just got a new job which means we need to leave our wonderful 1 bedroom apartment in 335 Bala Building.  We moved here during the pandemic so locked in a very low rate which means this apartment is a steal compared to current pricing!
The building is super luxurious with tons of amenities including a pool (see full list below) and the apartment itself has all modern finishes.  The management company here is excellent - in fact we moved from a building managed by the same company because we liked them so much! We'd be able to start renting our apartment as early as July 1 but are flexible on move in date any time before August 1.  We are so sad to leave!  The attached pictures show the apartment unfurnished but we are also open to renting the apartment furnished (happy to provide more pics of that)
Lease Details:
Rent: $2025.00 per month (our same apartment is listed for $2300 right now!)
Parking: $100 for covered spot, free otherwise
Lease term: July/August through 3/7/2024 at which time you can renew
Utilities: Gas and trash included; tenant responsible for electricity and water
Application fee and credit check required
Apartment Features:
- 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom (large standup shower with good water pressure)
- Open-concept layout with plenty of natural light
- Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
- Generous closet space for all your storage needs
- Cozy living room for relaxation and entertainment
- In-unit washer and dryer for added convenience
- Central heating and air conditioning for year-round comfort
- HEPA filter
- Outdoor deck area on balcony off living room
Building Amenities:
- Secure entry and intercom system
- Elevator access for easy mobility
- 2 Fitness centers (weights room and a bike room)
- Communal courtyard for outdoor relaxation with a full pool and grills
- 2 conference rooms, a game room, a library and a communal outdoor deck
- On-site parking available for residents (we currently have two parking spots)
- Pet-friendly
Location:
Nestled right between the vibrant and fun Manayunk downtown and the quiet, safe bala cynwyd neighboorhood.  You are walking distance to the River and trails that lead to Wissahickon park and downtown.

title: Charming neighborhood of Manayunk in Philadelphia
description:
Welcome to 4317 Pechin Street, located in the charming neighborhood of Manayunk in Philadelphia. This meticulously kept twin home is an absolute delight and is ready for you to move in and make it your own. As you approach the home, you'll be greeted by a picturesque front porch, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee or relaxing with a book. Step inside, and you'll be welcomed into a spacious living room adorned with beautiful hardwood floors that flow throughout the main level, creating an elegant and inviting ambiance. Make your way to the sun filled living room which leads you to your own private dining area. title: wonderful two-bedroom luxury condo with gated parking
description: Residence No. 5 at 1714 Spruce Street is a wonderful two-bedroom luxury condo with gated parking in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood. Situated on the third floor of a handsome 24’ wide brownstone, behind the ornate pediments and classic wooden doors, No. 5 offers a sophisticated and relaxing urban living experience. Upon entering, you will be greeted by a spacious open living and dining area, seamlessly integrated with the chef's kitchen. The kitchen boasts tall wooden cabinetry with upgraded hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an expansive central island with contemporary glass pendant lights. A marble-framed gas fireplace, candle style chandelier, and gilded oversized mirrors are perfectly paired and accentuate the already grand living area. The sunny sitting room is complete with an oversized window and a glass door that leads to an outdoor landing. Back inside, original hardwood floors are newly refinished and lead from the living area to a wide hallway that contains the first of two full bathrooms. With dual exposures, the hallway allows for a cross breeze through the expansive condo that has been freshly painted, from front to back and floor to ceiling. The tiled hall bath features a glass-enclosed shower and pedestal sink. A convenient storage closet is also located in the hall, on the way to the bedrooms. The large primary suite is perfectly charming and features a second gas fireplace with marble surround and chandelier that vie with twinkling city lights for your attention. The marble en-suite bathroom is a true luxury, complete with a soaking tub, separate glass-enclosed shower, and dual vanity sinks adorned with upgraded chrome hardware. Just outside of the en-suite are closets that house the front-loading LG ThinQ front-loading washer and dryer as well as the resident’s clothing. A second bedroom with tall ceilings is located off of the central hall and features an oversized window and interior closet. This residence comes complete with an on-site GATED PARKING SPACE and additional storage space in the building’s basement. A Nest thermostat and smart entry intercom add to the list of conveniences. This exceptional property is on par with the neighborhood that envelops it: Rittenhouse Square. Stop for fresh flowers, artisan cheeses, handmade chocolates, and the like each Saturday, at farmer’s market on the Square. Grab a morning coffee at La Colombe, visit Parc for lunch, and stroll Philadelphia’s prime shopping corridor on nearby Walnut Street. Amenities are abound with a Rittenhouse Square address, and it will be a pleasure to show you this exceptional property.
